item.description:
Please RSVP at the Permaculture Meetup Site, so we can keep track, thanks
http://permaculture.m...

Tuesday, November 14, 2006, 6:30 PM

Zero Station
222 Anderson
Portland , ME 04101


November's Meetup will feature guest speaker Pat Coon who is the owner (along with his wife Wynn) of Energy Works LLC. They are experts in designing and installing solar systems here in Maine and are in the process of opening up a branch in the Portland area. We will hear about available technology, costs, incentives, etc. for SOLAR HOT WATER SYSTEMS for your home.

We will meet at 6:30 for potluck dinner as always...followed by the presentation for about 45-60 minutes starting around 7:00 or 7:15. We should be able to open it up to discussion and questions around 8:00 or shortly thereafter.

My guess is that we will have more attendance at this event than we can manage with a house meeting, so we will be meeting at Zero Station in Portland.
item.name: Joint meetup/ SOLAR HOT WATER SYSTEMS
